Fitting Workflow

Source: vignettes/fitting_workflow.Rmd
fitting_workflow.Rmd

This vignette outlines a typical fit-to-data workflow for chlaa.

library(chlaa)

# 1) Build baseline parameters
pars <- cholera_parameters()

# 2) Prepare and validate case data
data_raw <- data.frame(time = 1:60, cases = sample.int(10, 60, replace = TRUE) - 1L)
data_fit <- cholera_prepare_data(data_raw)

# 3) Fit with pMCMC
fit <- cholera_fit_pmcmc(
  data = data_fit,
  pars = pars,
  n_particles = 200,
  n_steps = 2000,
  seed = 1
)

# 4) Posterior summaries and diagnostics
summary_tbl <- cholera_posterior_summary(fit)
diag_report <- cholera_fit_report(fit)
trace_plot <- cholera_plot_trace(fit, parameters = c("trans_prob", "contact_rate"))

# 5) Posterior predictive checks
ppc_plot <- cholera_plot_ppc(fit)

Developed by OJ Watson.
